name: Shawn Johnson Gymnastics
overview: Train with an Olympic champion in this game where you can experience the thrills of professional gymnastics! Shawn Johnson Gymnastics lets you learn with one of the best, 2008 gold- and silver-medal winner Shawn Johnson. Use your Wii Remote and Nunchuk to perform on the balance beam, vault, uneven bars, and floor. Shawn's voice offers guidance and inspiration, plus motivation to do well. Nail a routine and you'll unlock some of Shawn's best performances. Use the built-in choreography editor to design your own judge-wowing routines. Up to eight players can compete together, and the game is compatible with the Wii Balance Board for added realism.
